definition: stupid/sluggish/clumsy/to wiggle (of worms)/to move in a disorderly fashion

sentences.english: Never assume, for it makes an ASS out of U and ME. (Anon)
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要主觀臆斷，因爲那會使你我成爲蠢驢。

sentences.english: When they gave the donkey flowers to smell, it ate them.
sentences.chinese: 給蠢驢聞香花，它只會一口把它吞下。

sentences.english: Never assume, for it makes an ASS out of U and ME.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要主觀臆斷，因爲那會使你我成爲蠢驢。

sentences.english: Gave the donkey the flowers to smell, it ate them.
sentences.chinese: 遞給蠢驢鮮花嗅，結果只會吞下肚。

sentences.english: How do you keep a jackass in suspense?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼讓一頭蠢驢處於懸念中呢？

sentences.english: Indeed, I have been a complete ass, and I know it.
sentences.chinese: 說真格的，我是一隻十足的蠢驢，我心裏明白。

sentences.english: Take time to smell the flowers!
sentences.chinese: 遞給蠢驢鮮花嗅，結果只會吞下肚。

sentences.english: She can take the donkey. We have a donkey.
sentences.chinese: 派遣驢子去巴黎，回家仍舊是蠢驢。
